# Prerequisites

Here is what you need to implement the workflow outlined in this manual.

*Software*

- R - https://www.r-project.org/
- RStudio - https://www.rstudio.com/
- Git - https://git-scm.com/downloads
- Optional Git GUI client - https://git-scm.com/downloads
- Optional GitHub Account - https://github.com/
- Optional free private repositories from GitHub for education - https://education.github.com/discount_requests/new
- Optional modern and "hackable" text editor - https://atom.io/
